abstract: Actress Kate Winslet, who has received Academy Award nomination for her role in movie Steve Jobs, is known for wearing flattering and unfussy designs on red carpet.

headline.print_headline: Knowing How to Take Her Own Advice
headline.main: Kate Winslet Keeps It Simple and (Sometimes) Stylist-Free

snippet: Though hard to pigeonhole on the silver screen, the actress prefers simple gowns by designers like Roland Mouret and Ralph Lauren for the red carpet.
lead_paragraph: Though hard to pigeonhole on the silver screen, the actress prefers simple gowns by designers like Roland Mouret and Ralph Lauren for the red carpet.
